description: a(n) = n-2 + Sum of a(i+1) mod(a(i)) for i = 1 to n-2, for n >= 3.
comments: Essentially triangular numbers + 2, but with three extra initial terms.
links: Guo-Niu Han, Enumeration of Standard Puzzles [broken link]

author: _Clark Kimberling_
